text: @seanhannity Trump drug his feet intentionally. He is as irresponsible as a toddler who knows no better. His delayed response killed thousands. IF, his self-praise claim of a quick travel ban from China worked, why does the USA have more than 3x #COVID19 cases, & more deaths than any country?
